mapper.update: update tb_store set only_store_id = #{only_store_id}, integral_rate = #{integral_rate}, password = #{password}, service_rate = #{service_rate}, store_vip_id = #{store_vip_id}, logo = #{logo}, pictrue_url = #{pictrue_url}, recharge_times = recharge_times+1, transaction_times = transaction_times+1, withdraw_times = withdraw_times+1, merchant_level = #{merchant_level}, complex_score = #{complex_score}, comment_score = #{comment_score}, tixian_money = #{tixian_money}, store_id=store_id where store_id = #{store_id}
update tb_store a set a.zan_times = (select count(*) from tb_zan b where b.be_zan_id=a.store_id ), a.store_id=a.store_id where a.store_id = #{store_id}
update tb_store a set a.collection_times = (select count(*) from tb_collect b where b.store_id=a.store_id ), a.store_id=a.store_id where a.store_id = #{store_id}
update tb_store_file set endtime = now(), next_city_file_fee_id = #{next_city_file_fee_id}, store_id=store_id where store_id = #{store_id}

update tb_store_file set
em_statestatus=#{em_statestatus},
sf_statestatus=#{sf_statestatus},
earnest_status=#{earnest_status},
service_status=#{service_status},
sp_money=#{sp_money},
clerk_money=#{clerk_money},
biaozhun_content=#{biaozhun_content},
biaozhun_status=#{biaozhun_status},
city_file_fee_id = #{city_file_fee_id}, endtime = #{endtime}, starttime = #{starttime}, store_id=store_id where store_id = #{store_id}
mapper.select: select ifnull(a.password,'') as password from tb_store a where a.store_id = #{store_id}

select a.store_name, a.pictrue_url, a.check_status, a.store_vip_id, ifnull(a.merchant_status,'0') merchant_status, ifnull(a.comment_score,'0') comment_score, a.merchant_level, a.integral_rate, a.service_rate, a.withdraw_rate, a.lowest_score, a.remind_integral, a.sort_score, a.complex_score, a.recharge_times, a.transaction_times, a.withdraw_times, a.zan_times, a.collection_times, a.bigtype_max, a.smalltype_max, a.goods_max, a.registertel_phone, date_format(a.registertime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as registertime, a.store_file_id, ifnull(a.tixian_money,'0') tixian_money, a.longitude, a.latitude , a.jichushezhi, a.store_id, ifnull(a.istuisong,'0') as istuisong, ifnull(b.store_introduce,'') store_introduce, b.address, ifnull(b.phone_bymemeber,'') phone_bymemeber, ifnull(b.store_phone,'') store_phone, b.principal, b.phone, b.province_name, b.city_name, b.area_name, b.sp_file_id, b.clerk_file_id, b.earnest_status, b.em_statestatus, b.earnest_money, b.service_status, b.system_service_fee , b.sf_statestatus, ifnull(b.biaozhun_status,'0') as biaozhun_status, ifnull(b.biaozhun_content , '') as biaozhun_content, b.city_file_fee_id, b.next_city_file_fee_id, b.starttime, b.endtime, b.isopen_points, ifnull(b.transaction_points,'0') as transaction_points from tb_store a left join tb_store_file b on a.store_id=b.store_id where a.store_id = #{store_id}

select a.store_name, ifnull(a.complex_score,"") complex_score, ifnull(a.comment_score,"") comment_score, ifnull(a.pictrue_url,"") pictrue_url, ifnull(a.logo,"") logo, ifnull(b.store_introduce,"") store_introduce, ifnull(b.phone,"") phone, ifnull(b.store_phone,"") store_phone, ifnull(b.phone_bymemeber,"") as phone_bymemeber, ifnull(b.address,"") address, ifnull(b.business_licenses_image_one,"") business_licenses_image_one, ifnull(b.business_licenses_image_two,"") business_licenses_image_two, ifnull(b.license_image_one,"") license_image_one, ifnull(b.license_image_two,"") license_image_two, ifnull(b.license_image_three,"") license_image_three, ifnull(b.license_image_four,"") license_image_four, ifnull(b.license_image_fix,"") license_image_fix, ifnull(b.notice_information,"") notice_information, ifnull(b.management_projects_desc,"") management_projects_desc, a.longitude, a.latitude , a.store_id, b.sp_file_id, ifnull(a.istuisong,'0') as istuisong, (select c.team_name from tb_sp_file c where b.sp_file_id=c.sp_file_id ) as team_name, (select c.clerk_name from tb_clerk_file c where b.clerk_file_id=c.clerk_file_id ) as clerk_name from tb_store a left join tb_store_file b on a.store_id=b.store_id where a.store_id = #{store_id}
select a.store_name, a.store_id, b.sp_file_id, b.team_name, b.phone from tb_store_file a left join tb_sp_file b on a.sp_file_id=b.sp_file_id where a.store_id = #{store_id}

select a.store_name, ifnull(a.pictrue_url,"") pictrue_url, a.integral_rate, a.complex_score, a.comment_score, a.transaction_times, a.zan_times, a.sort_score, a.store_id from tb_store a where a.store_id = #{store_id} and check_status='1'
select store_name, sort_score, store_id from tb_store where store_name=#{content} or store_id=#{content}
select zan_times from tb_store where store_id=#{store_id}
select store_vip_id from tb_store where store_id=#{store_id}
select a.store_id, a.store_name from tb_store a where a.registertel_phone=#{phone} and a.check_status='1'

select count(*) from tb_store where check_status='1'
and CAST(comment_score AS DECIMAL(10,2)) < #{score}

select a.check_status, a.store_id, a.longitude, a.latitude from tb_store a where a.store_id in
#{item}
select a.store_id, a.store_name from tb_store a where a.store_id=#{store_id} and a.check_status='1'

select a.collect_id, a.store_id, a.member_id, a.collection_time, b.longitude, b.latitude from tb_collect a left join tb_store b on a.store_id=b.store_id where a.store_id=#{store_id} and member_id=#{member_id}

select a.collect_id, a.store_id, a.member_id, b.longitude, b.latitude , ifnull(cast(f.ordernumber as char) , '0') as transaction_times, cast((cast(round( 6378.138 * 2 * asin( sqrt( pow( sin(( abs(b.latitude * pi() / 180 - #{latitude} * pi() / 180) ) / 2 ), 2 ) + cos(b.latitude * pi() / 180) * cos( #{latitude} * pi() / 180) * pow( sin(( abs(b.longitude * pi() / 180 - #{longitude} * pi() / 180) ) / 2 ), 2 ))) ,3) as decimal(10,1))) as char) as distance, b.store_name, b.pictrue_url, b.comment_score, b.integral_rate from tb_collect a join tb_store b on a.store_id=b.store_id left join (select count(*) as ordernumber , store_id from tb_store_wealthhistory where profit_type='3' and process_status='1' group by store_id ) as f on b.store_id=f.store_id where member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_collect( collect_id, store_id, member_id, collection_time ) values ( #{collect_id}, #{store_id}, #{member_id}, now() )
mapper.select: select store_id from tb_collect where collect_id = #{collect_id}
select b.image_url, b.font_color, a.store_id from tb_store a left join tb_store_vip b on a.store_vip_id=b.store_vip_id where a.store_id=#{store_id}
select ifnull(a.store_name,"") as name, ifnull(a.pictrue_url,"") as image_url , a.store_id as id from tb_store a where a.store_id = #{store_id}
select ifnull(a.store_name,"") as name, ifnull(a.pictrue_url,"") as image_url , a.store_id as id from tb_store a
select ifnull(a.operator_name,"") as name, ifnull(b.pictrue_url,"") as image_url , a.store_operator_id as id from tb_store_operator a left join tb_store b on a.store_id=b.store_id

select ifnull(a.operator_name,"") as name, ifnull(b.pictrue_url,"") as image_url , a.store_operator_id as id from tb_store_operator a left join tb_store b on a.store_id=b.store_id where a.store_operator_id = #{store_operator_id} limit 1

select a.store_id, c.store_name, a.now_wealth, a.frozen_wealth, a.store_wealth_id, b.store_phone, c.tixian_money from tb_store_wealth a left join tb_store_file b on a.store_id=b.store_id left join tb_store c on a.store_id=c.store_id where a.wealth_type = '1'
and a.store_id = #{store_id}
select cast(a.now_wealth as DECIMAL(10,2) ) as now_wealth from tb_store_wealth a where a.store_id = #{store_id} and wealth_type = '1'
mapper.update: update tb_store_wealth set now_wealth = cast(now_wealth-#{money} as decimal(10,2) ), store_wealth_id=store_wealth_id where wealth_type = '1' and store_id = #{store_id}
update tb_store_wealth set now_wealth = #{now_wealth}, store_wealth_id=store_wealth_id where wealth_type = '1' and store_wealth_id = #{store_wealth_id} and store_id = #{store_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_store_wealthhistory( store_wealthhistory_id, wealth_type, profit_type, number, store_id, pay_type, store_operator_id, process_status, last_wealth, arrivalMoney, user_id, in_jiqi, jiaoyi_id, createtime, sp_getmoney, send_jf, oneday_renmaijifen, oneday_renmaimoney, transaction_points, orderfuwu_money, ordersp_getmoney ) values ( #{store_wealthhistory_id}, #{wealth_type}, #{profit_type}, #{number}, #{store_id}, #{pay_type}, #{store_operator_id}, #{process_status}, #{last_wealth}, #{arrivalMoney}, #{user_id}, #{in_jiqi}, #{jiaoyi_id}, now() , ifnull(#{sp_getmoney},'0'), ifnull(#{send_jf},'0'), ifnull(#{oneday_renmaijifen},'0'), ifnull(#{oneday_renmaimoney},'0'), ifnull(#{transaction_points},'0'), ifnull(#{orderfuwu_money},'0'), ifnull(#{ordersp_getmoney},'0') )
mapper.select: select * from tb_store_wealthhistory where store_wealthhistory_id = #{store_wealthhistory_id}
mapper.update: update tb_store_wealthhistory set process_status = #{process_status}, sp_getmoney = #{sp_getmoney}, user_id = #{user_id}, send_jf = #{send_jf}, store_wealthhistory_id=store_wealthhistory_id where store_wealthhistory_id = #{store_wealthhistory_id}
